item.title: This 20-Year-Old Sawtelle Art Show Is Made of Over 2,000 Post-it Notes
item.description:
Every December, thousands of well-known and emerging artists from around the world scale down their work on three-by-three inch Post-it notes and display them at Giant Robot 2 in Sawtelle. “Everything’s the same price,” Giant Robot owner Eric Nakamura says. “It’s all $30 each, so it makes it more fun and kind of democratic.”

item.description: Teams will represent Vandenberg SFB at this year's Guardian Arena competition at Patrick Space Force Base, FL, Dec. 8-9. Vandenberg teams, "Sidetrack'd," "Houston, We Have Two Kevin's (and Clay)," "Flying Tiger," and "CSpoc-alypse," will join 35 teams from across the Space Force to showcase their tactical proficiency, physical fitness, and mental resilience. The event highlights the "Guardian Spirit" in a service-level competition, bringing together participants from Field Commands, Space Base Delta, Space Launch Delta, and Space Delta to vie for the title of the most elite team of Guardians.
item.source:markdown:

How is this one of the toughest years for food businesses in a generation at the exact same time Latino culture is having its biggest, loudest, most mainstream moment in American history? Instead, restaurants, many of which are Mexican—the heart of that culture, the vanguard—are barely hanging on. 

The post ICE Raids Are Driving Customers Away From L.A. Restaurants, But We Can Still Save Them appeared first on L.A. TACO.

item.title: VSFB Leadership Welcomes Congressman to Serve Thanksgiving Meals to Guardians and Airmen
item.description: U.S. Congressman Salud Carbajal (D-24th/CA) joins U.S. Space Force Col. James T. Horne III, Space Launch Delta 30 commander, to give thanks for Vandenberg personnel at Breakers Dining Facility at Vandenberg Space Force Base, Calif., Nov. 27, 2025.
item.source:markdown:
U.S. Congressman Salud Carbajal (D-24th/CA) joins U.S. Space Force Col. James T. Horne III, Space Launch Delta 30 commander, to give thanks for Vandenberg personnel at Breakers Dining Facility at Vandenberg Space Force Base, Calif., Nov. 27, 2025.

item.title: President Trump Salutes VSFB's Guardians on Thanksgiving for Their Vital National Security Mission
item.description: U.S. President Donald J. Trump speaks with service members from across all military branches—including Guardians from the 18th Space Defense Squadron during a virtual meeting on Thanksgiving Day at Vandenberg Space Force Base, Calif., Nov. 27, 2025.
item.source:markdown:
U.S. President Donald J. Trump speaks with service members from across all military branches—including Guardians from the 18th Space Defense Squadron during a virtual meeting on Thanksgiving Day at Vandenberg Space Force Base, Calif., Nov. 27, 2025.
